scripts.copy-data: cp node_modules/pyodide/pyodide.asm.* ./full && cp node_modules/pyodide/pyodide_py.tar ./full && cp node_modules/pyodide/repodata.json ./full && cp ../pyodide-native-packages/* ./full
scripts.build:prod_raw_copy: del-cli full && mkdir full && cp node_modules/pyodide/pyodide.js ./full && cp node_modules/pyodide/pyodide.js.map ./full && yarn copy-data
scripts.build:prod_real_build: del-cli full && webpack --mode development && yarn patch-build && yarn copy-data
